Package mainenviro

Class RandomEvent

java.lang.Object
mainenviro.RandomEvent
public class RandomEvent extends Object
The Class RandomEvent. This class is called when that player chooses to continue to the next day. There are two random events that can occur: There is a small chance that the player will gain a random monster There is a small chance that the player will lose a random monster from their collection There is a small chance that a player's monster will level up overnight

  • Method Details

    • monsterLeaves

      public boolean monsterLeaves(Monster monster)
      This method determines if a monster leaves overnight. 1% chance the monster will leave if they did not lose all health during the day 2.5% chance the monster will leave if they did not lose all health during the day
      Parameters:
      monster - the monster
      Returns:
      true, if monster leaves

    • monsterLevelUp

      public boolean monsterLevelUp(Monster monster)
      This method determines by random chance if a monster level's up If the monster has won more battles that day, it's more likely to level up
      Parameters:
      monster - , the monster
      Returns:
      true, if level's up

    • willAddMonster

      public boolean willAddMonster()
      This method determines by randomly chance if a new will be added Monster to the user's list. The chance of this occuring is inversely correlated to the number of monsters the user has The monster choosen will be random
      Returns:
      true, if monster is added

    • addMonster

      public String addMonster()
      A method to return one of the names of a Monster by randomness
      Returns:
      a string which contains a monsters name
